editorialNotes.standard: CSR knows how to supercharge a sequel. Drag-racing is as fun as ever - and you won‚Äôt believe how good it all looks. And now you can squash other players in Live Races, which is about as fun as it gets.

editorialNotes.standard: We‚Äôre blown away by the newest installment of EA‚Äôs popular racing franchise. We found ourselves gawking at reflections, lens flare, and scenery as we motored through hairpin turns at breakneck speeds. The improvements aren't just cosmetic, though‚Äîyou'll find yourself stunned by the believable roars of engines and the huge variety of true-to-life cars and courses. RR3 also packs great new gameplay features like Time Shifted Multiplayer, which allows us to race asynchronously against friends in fierce tests of driving prowess.

name: Need for Speed No Limits Game

editorialNotes.standard: A glistening stretch of rain-soaked pavement lies before you. Will you drift, draft or smash your way to victory? Whatever your style, this iconic street racer delivers hugely fun arcade action. Impressive graphics make every Subaru, Porsche and McLaren a sight to behold, and a vast lineup of events gives you plenty of ways to show opponents your taillights. Individual races are enjoyably brief, and we got swept up in blazing through them to unlock the most exotic cars and discover the next challenges.

editorialNotes.tagline: Run, climb and swim to win

editorialNotes.standard: An endearing mix of two timeless franchises, this Angry Birds game cleverly melds the series‚Äô physics-based puzzling with the retro flair of ‚Äô80s-era Transformers. Rovio fans will feel a new kind of euphoria as they charge through side-scrolling levels, blasting foes and toppling towers with strategically placed shots. Gamers smitten with Hasbro‚Äôs shape-shifting robots will be just as pleased, thanks to a gleefully synth-heavy soundtrack and huge roster of playable Autobirds and Deceptihogs.

name: Auto Drift - Tuning Garage

editorialNotes.standard: Conquer street and sky in Gameloft‚Äôs fastest racing game yet, a mix of high-octane driving and incredible jumps that harkens back to the age of San Francisco Rush and classic Burnout. Pairing white-knuckle action with an array of career and online modes, it sets a new standard for arcade racers on the App Store.
Barrel through classic Disney locations as Mickey, Elsa, Mulan, Woody, and loads of other iconic characters in this thrilling racer.
Weather effects. Tilt controls. Deep customization. This feature-rich retro racer left our expectations in the dust.
